document.full_text: a hacker organization known as anonymous has released e-mail messages provided by a former bank of america employee who claims they show how a division of the bank sought to hide information on foreclosures.
document.title: bank of america unit tried to hide foreclosure information, hackers say
lines_and_colors: a hacker organization known as anonymous has released e-mail messages provided by a former bank of america employee who claims they show how a division of the bank sought to hide information on foreclosures.
